WorkflowInfo.Name: Download file and distribute it
WorkflowInfo.Description: Download file, copy it to a different location and unzip it
WorkflowInfo.XML:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?><SequentialWorkflowActivity x:Name="CustomWorkflow" xmlns:ns0="clr-namespace:FileDownload;Assembly=FileDownload, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns1="clr-namespace:ReturnValue;Assembly=ReturnValue, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns2="clr-namespace:FileCopy;Assembly=FileCopy, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns3="clr-namespace:SendEmail;Assembly=SendEmail, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns4="clr-namespace:ZipDecompress;Assembly=ZipDecompress, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:x="http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml" xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml/workflow" x:Class="WorkflowDesignerControl.CustomWorkflow"><ns0:FileDownload SrcPassword="" Proxy="" TimeInSeconds="0" TextToSearch="{x:Null}" Url="http://localhost/log.zip" HostName="localhost" ProxyUrls="" IsValid="True" SiteId="0" Password="" Path="c:\temp" x:Name="fileDownload1" TypeName="FileDownload" HostId="1" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" SiteName="Default Site" RequiresMap="True" URLPassword="" Timeout="00:01:00" UserName="" Description="Download a file from a specified URL" isChecked="False" URLUserName="" byPass="False" SrcUserName="" DisplayName="File Download" /><IfElseActivity x:Name="ifElseActivity1"><IfElseBranchActivity x:Name="ifElseBranchActivity1"><ns1:ReturnValue Value="Success" IsValid="True" x:Name="returnValue1" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" ConditionName="" UseBranchWhenTimeout="False" UseStoredValue="True" ConditionType="" DisplayName="Return Value" Formula="=Equals(&&&,Success)" Description="Use a returned value of a previous activity." ConditionNumber="-1" UseCustomeCondition="False" Type="StoredValue" TypeName="ReturnValue" /><ns2:FileCopy DstHostName="localhost" DstPassword="" x:Name="fileCopy1" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" IsValid="True" Timeout="00:01:00" SrcUserName="" SrcHostName="localhost" DstPath="\\192.168.1.10\c$\Archive\log.zip" SrcPath="c:\temp\log.zip" Description="Copy a file from a source location to a destination location" DisplayName="Copy File" SrcPassword="" DstUserName="" TypeName="FileCopy" /><IfElseActivity x:Name="ifElseActivity2"><IfElseBranchActivity x:Name="ifElseBranchActivity3"><ns1:ReturnValue Value="Success" IsValid="True" x:Name="returnValue3" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" ConditionName="" UseBranchWhenTimeout="False" UseStoredValue="True" ConditionType="" DisplayName="Return Value" Formula="=Equals(&&&,Success)" Description="Use a returned value of a previous activity." ConditionNumber="-1" UseCustomeCondition="False" Type="StoredValue" TypeName="ReturnValue" /><ns4:ZipDecompress SrcPassword="" TimeInSeconds="0" DstHostName="localhost" HostName="localhost" DisplayName="Zip Decompression" IsValid="True" HostId="1" x:Name="zipDecompress1" TypeName="ZipDecompress" CompressionLevel="{x:Null}" DstPath="\\192.168.1.10\c$\Archive" SrcHostName="localhost" DstPassword="" Timeout="00:01:00" SrcPath="\\192.168.1.10\c$\Archive\log.zip" ArchivePassword="" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" Description="Decompress a specified Zip file to the specified destination." DstUserName="" isPasswordEnabled="0" SrcUserName="" /></IfElseBranchActivity><IfElseBranchActivity x:Name="ifElseBranchActivity4"><ns1:ReturnValue Value="Failure" IsValid="True" x:Name="returnValue4" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" ConditionName="" UseBranchWhenTimeout="True" UseStoredValue="True" ConditionType="" DisplayName="Return Value" Formula="=Equals(&&&,Failure)" Description="Use a returned value of a previous activity." ConditionNumber="-1" UseCustomeCondition="False" Type="StoredValue" TypeName="ReturnValue" /><ns3:SendEmail Channel="0" TimeInSeconds="0" Subject="Failed to copy log.zip" DestinationNumber="1" x:Name="sendEmail2" TemplateNumber="0" ShiftLevel="" IsValid="True" HostId="-2" TemplateName="" TypeName="SendEmail" SendRN="False" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" DestinationTypeCc="User" DestinationType="User" HostName="{x:Null}" Timeout="00:00:00" DisplayName="Send Email" Attachments="" Cc="" Description="Send an email to a user, group or duty." Continue="False" DestinationNumberCc="0" Body="<!DOCTYPE HTML PUBLIC "-//W3C//DTD HTML 4.0 Transitional//EN">
<HTML><HEAD>
<META content="text/html; charset=utf-8" http-equiv=Content-Type>
<META name=GENERATOR content="MSHTML 10.00.9200.16618"></HEAD>
<BODY style="BACKGROUND-COLOR: white">Failed to copy log.zip</BODY></HTML>
" To="Admin" ShiftLevelCc="" MessageType="Custom" /></IfElseBranchActivity></IfElseActivity></IfElseBranchActivity><IfElseBranchActivity x:Name="ifElseBranchActivity2"><ns1:ReturnValue Value="Failure" IsValid="True" x:Name="returnValue2" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" ConditionName="" UseBranchWhenTimeout="True" UseStoredValue="True" ConditionType="" DisplayName="Return Value" Formula="=Equals(&&&,Failure)" Description="Use a returned value of a previous activity." ConditionNumber="-1" UseCustomeCondition="False" Type="StoredValue" TypeName="ReturnValue" /><ns3:SendEmail Channel="0" TimeInSeconds="0" Subject="Failed to download log.zip" DestinationNumber="1" x:Name="sendEmail1" TemplateNumber="0" ShiftLevel="" IsValid="True" HostId="0" TemplateName="" TypeName="SendEmail" SendRN="False" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" DestinationTypeCc="User" DestinationType="User" HostName="{x:Null}" Timeout="00:00:00" DisplayName="Send Email" Attachments="" Cc="" Description="Send an email to a user, group or duty." Continue="False" DestinationNumberCc="0" Body="<!DOCTYPE HTML PUBLIC "-//W3C//DTD HTML 4.0 Transitional//EN">
<HTML><HEAD>
<META content="text/html; charset=utf-8" http-equiv=Content-Type>
<META name=GENERATOR content="MSHTML 10.00.9200.16618"></HEAD>
<BODY style="BACKGROUND-COLOR: white">Failed to download log.zip</BODY></HTML>
" To="Admin" ShiftLevelCc="" MessageType="Custom" /></IfElseBranchActivity></IfElseActivity></SequentialWorkflowActivity>
